metadata.title: CVE-2021-32821 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: MooTools is a collection of JavaScript utilities for JavaScript developers.All known versions include a CSS selector parser that is vulnerable toRegular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS). An attack requires that anattacker can inject a string into a CSS selector at runtime, which is quitecommon with e.g. jQuery CSS selectors. No patches are available for thisissue.

criterions.comment: mootools package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
